SagaFeature.Description: A place of shelter and history. Wind shrine within Naikū complex
Built to last, this structure endures. Inner Shrine of Ise Jingū, dedicated to Amaterasu Ōmikami
These halls echo with the footsteps of those who came before. Auxiliary shrine within Naikū complex
